name: Metronidazole

ingredients.name: CARBOMER HOMOPOLYMER TYPE C (ALLYL PENTAERYTHRITOL CROSSLINKED)

indications: Metronidazole gel is indicated for topical application in the treatment of inflammatory papules and pustules of rosacea.
contraindications:
Apply and rub in a thin film of metronidazole gel twice daily, morning and evening, to entire affected areas after washing.
                  Areas to be treated should be cleansed before application of metronidazole gel. Patients may use cosmetics after application of metronidazole gel.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Metronidazole Gel USP, 0.75% is supplied in aluminum tubes containing:
                  5 g NDC 51672-4116-5 (physician sample, tube only) 
    30 g NDC 51672-4116-2 
    45 g NDC 51672-4116-6
adverseReactions: Metronidazole gel is contraindicated in individuals with a history of hypersensitivity to metronidazole, parabens, or other ingredients of the formulation.
